## Part 3: Salient differences between human writing and AI-genefared text

##  AI-generated prose is informationally dense 
<br>
By closely analyzing the language features, narrative structures, and communication strategies employed in these genres, we aim to discern how they reflect the values, goals, and reading purposes of their respective discourse communities, offering valuable insights into the role of language in shaping public understanding and academic inquiry in the realm of social media.

## [The information density in academic writing is different in degree, not kind.]{.small_h}

<br>
The [reduction]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} in [global]{bg-color="#D1CEDB"} [mortality]{bg-color="#DBCED8"} associated with [vaccinations]{bg-color="#DBCED8"} is [second]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} only to the [introduction]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} of [safe]{bg-color="#D1CEDB"} [drinking]{bg-color="#D1CEDB"} [water]{bg-color="#DBCED8"}. According to the World Health Organization, [childhood]{bg-color="#CEDBD1"} [vaccinations]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} prevent an estimated 2–3million [deaths]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} per [year]{bg-color="#DBCED8"}. Yet despite [global]{bg-color="#D1CEDB"} [increases]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} in [childhood]{bg-color="#CEDBD1"} [vaccine]{bg-color="#CEDBD1"} [uptake]{bg-color="#DBCED8"}, [rates]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} remain sub-optimal (<95%) with [vaccine-preventable]{bg-color="#D1CEDB"} [diseases]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} still posing a [public]{bg-color="#D1CEDB"} [health]{bg-color="#CEDBD1"} [risk]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"}.

<br>

## It isn't just about nouns though. Look at how repetition helps this passage cohere. 
<br>

The reduction in global mortality associated with [vaccinations]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} is second only to the introduction of safe drinking water. According to the World Health Organisation, childhood [vaccinations]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} prevent an estimated 2–3million deaths per year. Yet despite global increases in childhood [vaccine]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} uptake, rates remain sub-optimal (<95%), with [vaccine-preventable]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} diseases still posing a public health risk.

## Writers also concretize abstractions to build cohesion
<br>
[The reduction in global mortality associated with vaccinations]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"} is second only to the introduction of safe drinking water. According to the World Health Organisation, childhood vaccinations prevent an estimated 2–3million deaths per year. Yet despite [global increases in childhood vaccine uptake]{bg-color="#D8DBCE"}, rates remain sub-optimal (<95%), with vaccine-preventable diseases still posing a public health risk.

## GPT does not employ any of these features
<br>
By closely analyzing the language features, narrative structures, and communication strategies employed in these genres, we aim to discern how they reflect the values, goals, and reading purposes of their respective discourse communities, offering valuable insights into the role of language in shaping public understanding and academic inquiry in the realm of social media.
